verbs.description: Trump and Kim [V: have] lowered their expectations for the U.S .- North Korea summit in Singapore . The goal is not zero nukes but peace on the Korean Peninsula .
[ARG0: Trump and Kim] have [V: lowered] [ARG1: their expectations for the U.S .- North Korea summit in Singapore] . The goal is not zero nukes but peace on the Korean Peninsula .
Trump and Kim have lowered their expectations for the U.S .- North Korea summit in Singapore . [ARG1: The goal] [V: is] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: zero nukes but peace on the Korean Peninsula] .
